name: mogy-google-site-verification
description: Google Site Verification activities for Mogy

google-site-verification_getToken.description: Gets a verification token for the authenticated user to place on a website or domain.

google-site-verification_insert.description: Verifies ownership of a website or domain.

google-site-verification_list.description: Gets the list of the authenticated user's verified websites and domains.

google-site-verification_get.description: Retrieves the most current data for a website or domain.

google-site-verification_update.description: Modifies the list of owners for a website or domain.

google-site-verification_delete.description: Unverifies the user's ownership of a website or domain.
